mapper.update: update article set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, date = default(date) WHERE USERID = #{userID} AND ARTICLEID = #{articleID}
mapper.select: SELECT ARTICLEID,TITLE,CONTENT,DATE,R.USERID,COUNTRY FROM ARTICLE R INNER JOIN USER U ON R.USERID = U.USERID WHERE ARTICLEID = #{articleID}
SELECT ARTICLEID,TITLE,USERID,DATE FROM ARTICLE WHERE TITLE like CONCAT('%',#{query},'%') ORDER BY DATE DESC LIMIT #{page}, 10
SELECT CEILING(COUNT(*)/10) FROM ARTICLE WHERE TITLE like CONCAT('%',#{query},'%')
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ARTICLE WHERE USERID = #{uid} AND ARTICLEID = #{aid}
